body.description: 12-month warranty, our products are of good quality and we promise if there is any problem with the product within one year since you buy, it will be guaranteed for free If you have any questions or problem, please feel free to contact us via Amazon-Message-System With nice looking and high quality, this novelty USB is an excellent and amazing gift to your wedding clients, boyfriend, girlfriend, fiance, you deserve it! Store your world in our novelty cute rose gold crystal flash drive,storage has never been so fun! Perfect for keeping all of your documents, videos, music and photos handy Blue LED lights up when plugged in computer, which is very cool and fun! The fun and novelty shape makes it easily distinguishable from everyone else's flash drive The creative design makes the atmosphere a happier environment! Operating System: Windows 10/8/7/Vista/XP/ME/2000/ Mac OS X / Linux 2.6x and more Specifications: Interface: USB 2.0 Size: 2.36*0.7*0.39 inch Life:>1 million times Capacity:8GB/16GB/32GB/64GB Environment Temperature: -40 C - +70 C Storage Temperature: -50 C - +80 C USB Service Voltage: 4.5V-5.5V Storage Lifetime: More than 10 years Hardware Requirement: PC with USB connection, Notebook, MAC Note: Flash memory vendors are using decimal arithmetic:1MB = 1000KB,1G = 1000MB calculated, the operating system using binary arithmetic:1MB = 1024KB,1GB = 1024MB Capacity is based on 1 GB = 1 billion bytes. A portion of the memory is used for data management functions and therefore usable storage capacity will be less. About Real Capacity: 8GB = approximately 7.4GB-7.85GB 16GB=approximately 14.2GB - 15.8GB 32GB=approximately 28GB - 30GB 64GB=approximately 58GB - 60GB Package Included: 1 X USB Flash Drive

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 790 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cute and elegant. Works and is fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great produce to gift to impress
reviews.reviewText: This product is beautiful and it not too big but just the right size to wear around the neck. I purchased it to be used as a gift to renowned artist that had my recordings and contact information on the flash drive. It was well received by the artist. And, I gave it to her when I was around about 30 people standing and watching. The words spoken to me by others was how clever. The artist placed the jewery flash drive around her neck because it was beautiful. Yes, I will purchase other types such as this. A great presentation gift to impress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars They don't work
reviews.reviewText: I'm a wedding photographer and I ordered a bunch of these to send clients their wedding photos on. They're beautiful and I've ordered similar ones on Amazon years ago so when I found these on Amazon again, I ordered a bunch. Out of 13 drives, only 2 worked. The others wouldn't mount onto my computer and an error messages pops up saying I need to eject it. I tried repairing the drive through Disk Utility and that doesn't work. I called Amazon to get replacement drives and they were great. They sent me a replacement for all the ones that didn't work. But when I got the replacement ones in, they all don't work either! Garbage flash drives. So disappointed because they're so pretty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Perfect Hidden USB keychain
reviews.reviewText: Most people will look at it and assume its just another funny bauble on your key set but when you unscrew the usb from the keychain their faces are in shock cause theyll think its really cool. Functions as intended the light could be a bit brighter in well lit areas but in a dim room it looks so much better. Usb only lights up while files are being accessed its not consistently lit up, Lasted from February until October with on and off use at work. So if you are planning to use it a lot it may not be the best idea

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very attractive, unadvertised blue light when accessing
reviews.reviewText: Even better looking than photo. Like the blue light when it is plugged in accessing files. Like he nice little plastic case it comes in. Not something I am likely to use a lot, perhaps not enough to find out if it heats up. Since it didn't heat up at all when I tried it, I gave it the full five stars for "warmth" even though I'm not certain that is what they/you want to know.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks slick, conversation starter
reviews.reviewText: This is purely an aesthetic item. It isn't the fastest, most secure, or most durable drive. The crystal part and light are just on top of a small drive. That said, it looks outstanding and you will get constant comments and compliments on your "sci fi" drive. Good for speakers and such.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a beautiful Family Memory
reviews.reviewText: In my women's bible study class, on ZOOM, we are studying a specific group of women in the bible. The last 15 minutes, one woman tells us her "story" of the people who have influenced the woman she has become today. We then take a copy of the recording and trim it to that specific section; I save it to the flash drive and then give it to the woman to hand down to her family. Not only do her children/grandchildren learn about the influences in their mother/grandmother's life, they hear it told in her voice. They are absolutely floored by this gift.
